text: isakee bahut sambhaavana hai ki yadi vah tumhen talaaq de de to usaka rab tumhaare badale mein tumase achchhee patniyaan use pradaan kare - muslim, eemaanavaalee, aagyaakaarinee, tauba karanevaalee, ibaadat karanevaalee, (allaah ke maarg mein) safar karanevaalee, vivaahita aur kunvaariyaan bhee
